languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}Причастность{/d} рода Гапрак к заговору против вас не вызывает сомнений... Надеюсь, их смерть остановит расползнание еретической заразы среди знати в ваших владениях".

traits.locale_text: "Семейство Гапрак посвятило свою жизнь служению Омниссии. После того, что случилось с Кьява-Гаммой, их будущее стало размытым и неясным. Причастность рода Гапрак к заговору против вас не вызывает сомнений... Надеюсь, их смерть их действительно остановит расползнание еретической заразы среди знати в ваших владениях — и не только на Даргонусе".

languages.text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}Причастность{/d} рода Гапрак к заговору против вас не вызывает сомнений... Надеюсь, их смерть остановит расползнание еретической заразы среди знати в ваших владениях".

traits.locale_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks are involved in the conspiracy against you... I hope that their death will end the spread of the heretical disease among the nobles in your dominion."

"There is no doubt that the Gapraks were involved in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

"There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

languages.text: 「ギャプラック家があなたを狙う陰謀に{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}加担{/d}していたのは間違いありません…彼らが死んだことで、疫病のような異端がロード・キャプテンの領内の貴族に広がるのを止められるといいのですが」
languages.original_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

traits.locale_text: 「ギャプラック家があなたを狙う陰謀に{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}加担{/d}していたのは間違いありません…彼らが死んだことで、疫病のような異端がロード・キャプテンの領内の貴族に広がるのを止められるといいのですが」

languages.text: “毫无疑问，贾帕克家族{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}参与{/d}了这场针对您的阴谋……希望这场处决能够结束王朝贵族之中的异端疫病。”
languages.original_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，贾帕克家族参与了这场针对您的阴谋……我希望这场处决能够结束异端的疫病在王朝的贵族间蔓延。”

languages.text: « Les Gaprak étaient forcément {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}impliqués{/d} dans le complot... J'espère que leur mort empêchera l'hérésie de se répandre davantage parmi les nobles de votre domaine. »
languages.original_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

traits.locale_text: « Les Gaprak étaient forcément impliqués dans le complot... J'espère que leur mort empêchera l'hérésie de se répandre davantage parmi les nobles de votre domaine. »

languages.text: «No hay duda de la {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}implicación{/d} de los Gapraks en el complot... Espero que su muerte acabe con la pestilente herejía que se extiende entre los nobles de su dominio».
languages.original_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

traits.locale_text: «No hay duda de la implicación de los Gapraks en el complot... Espero que su muerte acabe con el mal que se extiende entre los nobles de su dominio».

languages.text: "Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass die Gapraks an der Intrige gegen Euch {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}beteiligt waren{/d} ... Ich hoffe, mit ihrem Tod wird sich die ketzerische Seuche nicht weiter im Adel Eures Reichs ausbreiten."
languages.original_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

traits.locale_text: "Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass die Gapraks an der Intrige gegen Euch beteiligt sind ... Ich hoffe, mit ihrem Tod wird sich die ketzerische Seuche nicht weiter im Adel Eures Reichs ausbreiten."
"Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass die Gapraks an der Intrige gegen Euch beteiligt waren ... Ich hoffe, mit ihrem Tod wird sich die ketzerische Seuche nicht weiter im Adel Eures Reichs ausbreiten."

languages.text: "Gaprakların şahsınızı hedef alan entrikaya {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}dâhil{/d} olduğu şüphesiz... Umarım topraklarınızdaki soylular arasında yayılan kâfirlik pisliği, idamlardan sonra temizlenir."
languages.original_text: "There is no doubt that the Gapraks were {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}involved{/d} in the plot targeting you... I hope their death will end the spread of pestilential heresy among the nobles in your dominion."

traits.locale_text: "Gaprak kısmının şahsınızı hedef alan entrikaya {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}dâhil{/d} olduğu şüphesiz... Umarım topraklarınızdaki soylular arasında yayılan kâfirlik pisliği, idamlardan sonra temizlenir."
